name: About me
value: Canadian, curious, human. I work in the arts and culture sector. I have a loving family, including a trans-AuDHD kid, whom I wish to protect by remaining relatively anonymous. Am loudly and proudly a lgbtqtia2s+ ally. Politically, I'm opposed to Nazis.

name: Interests
value: Space, electric cars, sustainable energy, the performing arts, preventing the planet from killing off human civilization (even though we deserve it).
